channel.title: How to change XP rates?
channel.description: need to know how you would go about changing XP per hit on a monster or person, thanks!

item.title: How to change XP rates?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“suomirunee, post:4, topic:252534”][quote author=Elven Dremor link=topic=333521.msg2598789#msg2598789 date=1230118724]
Ok so open your client.java
press ctrl+f
search [QUOTE]double TotalExp[/QUOTE]

Then you should see something like this

[QUOTE] double TotalExp = 0;
if (!UseBow)
animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 1200;
if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType != 0) {
if (UseBow || UseCrossBow || UseRing) {
TotalExp = (double)(300hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
} else if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double)(300hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
} else {
TotalExp = (double)(300hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
}
TotalExp = (double)(300hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
attackTimer = 7;
specOn = false;
specAttack();[/QUOTE]

See [QUOTE] TotalExp = (double)(300*hitDiff);[/QUOTE]
Change it to whatever you want to hit per 1 damage you deal on the monster.
[/quote]And you leached it from me! :mad:[/quote]

And you leeched it from the source. You can’t take credits for it…

Read full topic

See [QUOTE] TotalExp = (double)(300*hitDiff);[/QUOTE]
Change it to whatever you want to hit per 1 damage you deal on the monster.[/quote]And you leached it from me! :mad:

item.title: How to change XP rates?
item.dc:creator: @Elven_Dremor Elven Dremor
item.description:
@Elven_Dremor wrote:

Ok so open your client.java
press ctrl+f
search [QUOTE]double TotalExp[/QUOTE]

Then you should see something like this

[QUOTE] double TotalExp = 0;
if (!UseBow)
animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 1200;
if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType != 0) {
if (UseBow || UseCrossBow || UseRing) {
TotalExp = (double)(300hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
} else if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double)(300hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
} else {
TotalExp = (double)(300hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
}
TotalExp = (double)(300hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
attackTimer = 7;
specOn = false;
specAttack();[/QUOTE]

See [QUOTE] TotalExp = (double)(300*hitDiff);[/QUOTE]
Change it to whatever you want to hit per 1 damage you deal on the monster.
